name: San Jose Museum of Art
description: The San Jose Museum of Art is the leading museum of modern and contemporary art in Silicon Valley, located in a beautiful historic building in downtown San Jose. It features rotating exhibitions and a growing permanent collection.
fullDescription: The San Jose Museum of Art is the leading museum of modern and contemporary art in Silicon Valley, located in a beautiful historic building in downtown San Jose. It features rotating exhibitions and a growing permanent collection.
whatTheyOffer:
- EBT cardholders: Free admission
- Children under 6: Free admission
- First Fridays: Free admission for everyone (5-10pm)
- Students with ID: $5 admission
- Seniors (65+): $8 admission
- Regular admission: $12 adults
howToGetIt: Present your EBT card at the admissions desk for free entry any day. No reservation required. Visit on First Friday evenings for free community nights with art activities and entertainment.
address: 110 South Market Street, San Jose, CA 95113
keywords: San Jose Museum of Art, SJMA, downtown San Jose, EBT free, First Friday free, modern art, contemporary art, Silicon Valley
